mHSzHntFOCUfyQEQl.name: Directional
mHSzHntFOCUfyQEQl.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

m7n0z0LcXXvzSbldt.name: Tough Skin
m7n0z0LcXXvzSbldt.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

mtH70bDEZuKlGjZRj.name: Oxygen Storage
mtH70bDEZuKlGjZRj.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

mRzDgXRxnAhxAPNQJ.name: Oxygen Storage
mRzDgXRxnAhxAPNQJ.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

mX182DWk7vMsMvg0T.name: Oxygen Storage
mX182DWk7vMsMvg0T.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

m3iL-7rCzFsEBq4lH.name: Oxygen Storage
m3iL-7rCzFsEBq4lH.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mtIKKKx70CdWbU-KZ.name: Oxygen Storage
mtIKKKx70CdWbU-KZ.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

mVzOV61aG2wnTJLzo.name: Diffuse
mVzOV61aG2wnTJLzo.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mAkL3BjrkvYmF4m1X.name: Homogenous
mAkL3BjrkvYmF4m1X.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mmvB7syik4Ju4H8pe.name: No Blood
mmvB7syik4Ju4H8pe.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mjavZb2Chf6bmTqmh.name: No Brain
mjavZb2Chf6bmTqmh.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mvFECjhU5mSzAkkki.name: No Eyes
mvFECjhU5mSzAkkki.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

m2hA90lUKxkauaKlm.name: No Head
m2hA90lUKxkauaKlm.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mcUp150VZNR53-aDj.name: No Neck
mcUp150VZNR53-aDj.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

m7V5hNMSj-vwmFhtV.name: No Vitals
m7V5hNMSj-vwmFhtV.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mWrbfNRVaKkq4zPlR.name: Unliving
mWrbfNRVaKkq4zPlR.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

mVSdpxvPozWbs3TV_.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

mcIU9nRUX3PZ3syVU.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

mSPZmjOOB-WsNZQCc.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist
